Avatar Roshik:
What brings you to these desert lands? My name is Roshik, I teach the Orcs their traditional Kawat martial art.
God Paagrio teaches that the strongest in the world can only be achieved through endless work on oneself. I myself arrived here a month ago and am trying to become stronger through training, fasting and meditation.
If you apply the strength of body and spirit to defeat frost and hunger, you can kindle the hot fire of a fighting spirit in your soul. Maybe you will join me?
